info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 58350
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 58350
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
matchid.io.	1800	IN	SOA	tia.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2330295154 10000 2400 604800 1800

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 27975
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 27975
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;deces.matchid.io.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
deces.matchid.io.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=R8qdKQhQRtLbMF_bALIP-CGC16_BJCZSy8Olu7RTzY8"

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

GET / HTTP/1.1

Accept: */*

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: deces.matchid.io
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Alt-Svc: h3=":443"; ma=86400 Cf-Cache-Status: DYNAMIC Cf-Ray: 8451f8c6ac812a8f-LAX Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 14 Jan 2024 01:05:38 GMT Nel: {"success_fraction":0,"report_to":"cf-nel","max_age":604800} Report-To: {"endpoints":[{"url":"https:\/\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\/report\/v3?s=TZed312vP%2FQ0n6StLzZkWXdAmA%2FJItVuaxVCpDq%2FiLwLuuaG2eKVFy%2Fn37OIYsvNbFMEQIZVEDiq20W%2FtYmyzneVh%2BSTQFecg1eKSqW41idc2F%2B87AP0NluCe27OinQDml4y"}],"group":"cf-nel","max_age":604800} Server: cloudflare Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15552000; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff 405 Not Allowed

405 Not Allowed

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: deces.matchid.io' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://deces.matchid.io/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: Wildcard TLS Certificate
author: lucky0x0d
info.description: Checks a sites certificate to see if there are wildcard CN or SAN entries.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
